keyMoments.title: Pekoms' Shadowed Debut
keyMoments.description: Pekoms arrives at Fish-Man Island alongside Tamago as a member of the Big Mom Pirates to collect the monthly candy tribute.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of a Big Mom Pirates crew member, setting up the conflict with Luffy and introducing Big Mom's influence in the New World.

relationships.description: Pekoms works alongside Tamago as partners in the Big Mom Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Tamago's Shadowed Debut
keyMoments.description: Baron Tamago arrives at Fish-Man Island with Pekoms to collect Big Mom's candy tribute, appearing only in silhouette.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of another Big Mom Pirates member and the candy tribute conflict that leads to Luffy's confrontation with Big Mom.

relationships.description: Tamago works alongside Pekoms as partners in the Big Mom Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Shirahoshi Revealed as Poseidon
keyMoments.description: King Neptune reveals to Robin that Shirahoshi is the Ancient Weapon Poseidon, possessing the ability to command the Sea Kings.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most important reveals in the series, establishing Shirahoshi as one of the three Ancient Weapons and connecting her to the Void Century and Joy Boy's promise.

keyMoments.title: Caribou Attempts Kidnapping
keyMoments.description: Caribou attempts to kidnap Shirahoshi after learning she is Poseidon, but is stopped by Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the immediate danger that comes with the secret of her identity being exposed.

abilities.description: The ability to communicate with and command Sea Kings, making her the Ancient Weapon Poseidon.

relationships.description: Neptune is Shirahoshi's father and protects the secret of her identity as Poseidon.

evolutionMoments.description: Neptune entrusts Robin with the secret that Shirahoshi is Poseidon.

reveals.information: Shirahoshi is the Ancient Weapon Poseidon
She possesses the power to command Sea Kings

keyMoments.title: Jinbe Updates Straw Hats on New World Changes
keyMoments.description: Jinbe informs the Straw Hats about the major changes in the New World during the timeskip, including Akainu becoming Fleet Admiral and Blackbeard becoming a Yonko.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jinbe's role as a bridge between the Straw Hats and the wider world of the New World, establishing him as an invaluable source of information.
keyMoments.quote: Akainu fought against Aokiji for the title of Fleet Admiral on a certain island. Akainu won the title and Aokiji left since he did not want to work under Akainu.

reveals.information: Jinbe knows about the ten-day battle between Akainu and Aokiji
Jinbe is aware of Blackbeard's rise to Yonko status

keyMoments.title: Caribou Learns Shirahoshi is Poseidon
keyMoments.description: Caribou eavesdrops on Neptune and Robin's conversation and discovers that Shirahoshi is the Ancient Weapon Poseidon.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a major ongoing threat as a villain now possesses knowledge of one of the world's most dangerous secrets.

keyMoments.title: Caribou Attempts to Kidnap Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Caribou attempts to capture Shirahoshi to exploit her powers or sell her.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the immediate danger of the secret being exposed.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Kicks Caribou from the Palace
keyMoments.description: Luffy discovers Caribou and kicks him from the palace tower, sending him flying.
keyMoments.significance: Protects Shirahoshi but allows Caribou to escape with dangerous knowledge.

reveals.information: Caribou learns that Shirahoshi is the Ancient Weapon Poseidon

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Hody Suffers Energy Steroid Side Effects
keyMoments.description: Hody and his crew are shown dramatically aged in their prison cells as the Energy Steroids' side effects manifest, turning the 30-year-old into a frail elderly man.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the severe consequences of abusing the Energy Steroids and permanently removes Hody as a threat, serving as a cautionary tale about shortcuts to power.

reveals.information: Energy Steroid side effects cause rapid aging and extreme physical deterioration

keyMoments.title: Robin Learns Shirahoshi is Poseidon
keyMoments.description: King Neptune confides in Robin that Shirahoshi is the Ancient Weapon Poseidon, trusting her with one of the world's most dangerous secrets.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Neptune's trust in Robin and her importance as an archaeologist who understands the weight of this knowledge.

keyMoments.title: Discussion of the Three Ancient Weapons
keyMoments.description: Robin and Neptune discuss Pluton, Poseidon, and Uranus - the three Ancient Weapons from the Void Century.
keyMoments.significance: Connects Robin's knowledge from Alabasta and Skypiea to the current revelation about Shirahoshi.

reveals.information: Robin learns that Shirahoshi is Poseidon, completing her knowledge of two of the three Ancient Weapons (Pluton and Poseidon)

keyMoments.title: Neptune Reveals Shirahoshi is Poseidon
keyMoments.description: King Neptune trusts Robin with the secret that his daughter Shirahoshi is the Ancient Weapon Poseidon.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Neptune's trust in the Straw Hats and his burden of protecting his daughter's dangerous secret.
keyMoments.quote: There are three ancient weapons: Pluton, Uranus, and Poseidon. And Shirahoshi is Poseidon.

relationships.description: Neptune is Shirahoshi's father and bears the burden of protecting the secret of her identity as Poseidon.
Neptune trusts Robin with the dangerous secret about Shirahoshi being Poseidon.
